channel.title: I-140 on Kirill Nikitin's Personal Page

item.title: My approved DYI EB-1A green card petition
item.description: Documents: - Full I-140 petition - I-485 petition - I-140 and I-485 LaTeX templates (an adaptation of the template by (Razvan Marinescu)[https://razvanmarinescu.github.io/green-card-I-140/]) Background I have recently received my U.S. green card after successfully petitioning under the EB-1A category as an alien of extraordinary ability in sciences. I prepared and filed my petition without help of a law firm or attorney. I, however, learned and benefited from petition examples of other scientists that I found online and from a couple petitions shared with me by friends.
